title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When working in a Java editor in Photon, there is no popup menu that appears when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
EB: I expect a popup menu to appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
I expect to see a popup menu that allows me to add breakpoints or marks, but this menu is currently not appearing.
